commitResults.messageTitle: Renamed Project from Duke to Icey
Added Greet and Exit to Icey.java

commitResults.messageBody:
- Implemented main interaction loop that echoes user commands
- Added reply() helper method with indentation and dividers
- Support 'bye' command to exit gracefully
- Refactor instance methods greetUser() and exit() to class methods and use reply() method

commitResults.messageTitle: Added Task Storage and List to Icey.java
commitResults.messageBody:
- Added ArrayList to store tasks dynamically
- Implemented addTask() to store task additions
- Implemented listTasks() to display all tasks with numbering
- Replaced echo functionality with task storage
- Extracted INDENT constant for consistent formatting

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Task class and mark/unmark commands
commitResults.messageBody:
- Create Task class with description and isDone status
- Implement markTask() and unmarkTask() with validation/error handling
- Refactor main loop to use switch statement with command parsing

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Task subclasses for Todo, Deadline, and Event
commitResults.messageBody:
- Create Todo class extending Task with [Todo] tag
- Create Deadline class with 'by' field for deadline date
- Create Event class with 'from' and 'by' fields for event duration
- Add command placeholders for todo, deadline, and event in main loop

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor command handling and implement Todo, Deadline, and Event commands
commitResults.messageBody:
- Extract command handling into dedicated handler methods
- Implement full todo, deadline, and event command functionality with validation
- Display task count with pending tasks in addTask replies
- Shorten task type labels from full names to single letters (T, D, E)

- Added test cases to input.txt
- Tests cover valid commands, invalid arguments, and edge cases

I didn't realize this earlier, but previous implementations already covered error handling
Here are the errors currently being handled:
- Validate command arguments for all commands (todo, deadline, event, list, mark, unmark, bye)
- Check for empty descriptions and missing required fields
- Validate task numbers with proper format checking
- Handle invalid task indices with bounds checking
- Replace default case to show helpful error message with available commands
- Prevent double-marking tasks as done/undone with state checks

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor error handling to use custom exceptions
commitResults.messageBody:
- Created IceyException class
- Converted all handler methods to throw IceyException instead of early returns
- Added try-catch block in main loop to handle and display exceptions
- Consolidated parseTaskIndex bounds checking into single method

commitResults.messageTitle: Add delete command to remove tasks from list
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implemented handleDelete() method with validation
- Added "delete" case to command switch statement
- Updated input.txt and EXPECTED.TXT for delete tests

commitResults.messageTitle: Add TaskType enum to centralize task type
commitResults.messageBody:
- Create TaskType enum with TODO, DEADLINE, and EVENT constants
- Centralize type symbols in enum for easier maintenance

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor Icey class to use instance methods instead of static
commitResults.messageBody:
- Convert static methods to instance methods for better OOP design
- Keep constants (NAME, DIVIDER, INDENT) as static final
